message.body: Well the wait is over. No more Zach and Molly. Deleted fb for a while but didn't want you to find out through social media.
Oh sweetheart. I'll be thinking of you. Im proud of you and am humbly there every step of your way. I love you. Let me know f you need anything.
Thanks. It isn't easy that's for sure.
How are you today, love?
Feeling okay. I really think I will be until 1. I reactivate my fb and 2. Garth brooks sings the dance next weekend at the concerts. I cry at that song anyway but I think I will have a breakdown!
Maybe prep yourself and listen to it a few times? A good cry is sometimes nice too. And maybe you never have to reactivate! But im glad you're ok.

Yeah, I have been. It is just so so beautiful live that I'm not sure I can make it through! But it isn't for 2 weekends so hopefully I can make it. I went to the DMV today and the guy took my picture three times. I'm scared what it is going to look like!
I also just might utilize Pearl's fb too. All the people I really care about are friends on that page so I might just avoid my own page for a while.
You're going to look beautiful. Your worst in a drivers license is still way better than most peoples bests. What are you afraid of on facebook? Seeing Zachs info?
Him detagging pics and stuff, deleting my friends. And the fact that I think he wants to get with a girl he works with.
What a guy. Yea, maybe just hide his business too!
I'm not entirely sure if he does. But I just get the feeling. Which would make two breakups in a row that that has happened to me.
Either way, you're better off I think.
Wait whoa! That's really exciting :)
Yea, and now you get a fresh start :)
But I'm going to ca tomorrow thru Thursday then friday I'm going to Washington state. Then next Tuesday I will start my new job so things are good.
This breakup had been a long time coming.
Yep. And it is going to be good. I basically get to start my dream career ladder Tuesday so things won't suck forever.
Have you watched weeds yet?
About 5 minutes are good, the other 22 are snoozy!
No not yet, is it worth the download?
Breaking bad has become my happy substite for weeds. So good.
I couldn't watch after the second episode with the body and the bathtub.
Yea, you have to push through a little and then it gets really interesting.
I was so absolutely disturbed by it. That's what other people have said too that nothing is that bad throughout the rest of the show
Yea, the violence is outweighed by everything else. It's got a flavor of the first season of weeds a little. Family stuff
Maybe I will give it another try!
